# `AdditionalMatchCriteria` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| topics | [`TopicCriteria[]`](topiccriteria-definition.md) | No | List of topics with specific data ingestion rules to filter messages for escalation. |
| mediaFilter | `string` | No | Escalate message based on media presence. Not setting any value will escalate all types of msg. |
